definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Dashu knows to lower his head when he wants to get under his bed.
sentences.chinese: 大樹爬進小牀的時候會把頭低下，匍匐前進。

sentences.english: For the application of somatic cell nuclear transfer (SCNT), low cloning efficiency is a great barrier.
sentences.chinese: 效率低下對體細胞克隆技術的應用形成了巨大的障礙。

sentences.english: To mother's facial expression mortified, lower the brain.
sentences.chinese: 向媽媽臉色尷尬，低下頭去。

sentences.english: The narrator bowed his head, and the boys shouted.
sentences.chinese: 敘述者低下頭來，和孩子們喊道。

sentences.english: Why are living standards so meager in many African countries?
sentences.chinese: 爲何許多非洲國家的生活水平如此低下？

sentences.english: However, it is still serious that Chinese classroom teaching is inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 然而當前語文課堂教學效率低下現象依然嚴重。

sentences.english: Audrey hung her head when I shouted at her.
sentences.chinese: 我對奧德麗嚷嚷時她低下了頭。

sentences.english: They all reverently bowed their heads and hearts.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都虔誠地低下了頭，在心裏致敬。

sentences.english: The confusion caused by the traffic order is inefficient because of traffic.
sentences.chinese: 這些混亂的交通秩序是造成交通效率低下的原因。

sentences.english: He was silent, lowering his head.
sentences.chinese: 他這才低下頭不做聲了。

sentences.english: The low of fast attack also influences the overall ability of attack.
sentences.chinese: 快攻能力低下，也使中國隊進攻整體上受到影響。

sentences.english: Some metamorphic relations (MR) are not good at detecting faults in metamorphic testing.
sentences.chinese: 蛻變測試時經常會出現蛻變關係檢錯能力低下的情況。

sentences.english: I looked down and saw that it was purple.
sentences.chinese: 我低下頭，看到手臂發紫。

sentences.english: The result is that sortie rates will be low, with a "huge tanker demand."
sentences.chinese: 結果就是，有了“巨大的油輪需求”，出動率低下。

sentences.english: All are bowed beneath the equality of baptismal names.
sentences.chinese: 大家都在洗名的平等前低下頭去。

definition: small and weak/puny/the small and weak/children/women and children
to be deficient in sth/to be short of sth (supplies, money etc)
to face squarely/to meet head on/to face up to
